1{-# OPTIONS_GHC -Wall #-}
2
3-- | Unicode general category.
4
5module Koshucode.Baala.Subtext.Category
6 ( -- * Category group
7   categoryLetter,
8   categoryMark,
9   categoryNumber,
10   categoryPunctuation,
11   categorySymbol,
12   categorySeparator,
13   categoryOther,
14   categoryAlpha,
15   categorySign,
16   categoryOpen,
17   categoryClose,
18
19   -- * Category lookup
20   categoryLookup,
21 ) where
22
23import qualified Data.Char      as C
24import qualified Data.Set       as Set
25
26
27-- --------------------------------------------  Category group
28
29-- | List of letter categories (L).
30categoryLetter      :: [C.GeneralCategory]
31categoryLetter       = [C.UppercaseLetter, C.LowercaseLetter, C.TitlecaseLetter,
32                        C.ModifierLetter, C.OtherLetter]
33
34-- | List of mark categories (M).
35categoryMark        :: [C.GeneralCategory]
36categoryMark         = [C.NonSpacingMark, C.SpacingCombiningMark, C.EnclosingMark]
37
38-- | List of number categories (N).
39categoryNumber      :: [C.GeneralCategory]
40categoryNumber       = [C.DecimalNumber, C.LetterNumber, C.OtherNumber]
41
42-- | List of punctuation categories (P).
43categoryPunctuation :: [C.GeneralCategory]
44categoryPunctuation  = [C.ConnectorPunctuation, C.DashPunctuation,
45                        C.OpenPunctuation, C.ClosePunctuation, C.InitialQuote,
46                        C.FinalQuote, C.OtherPunctuation]
47
48-- | List of symbol categories (S).
49categorySymbol      :: [C.GeneralCategory]
50categorySymbol       = [C.MathSymbol, C.CurrencySymbol,
51                        C.ModifierSymbol, C.OtherSymbol]
52
53-- | List of separator categories (Z).
54categorySeparator   :: [C.GeneralCategory]
55categorySeparator    = [C.Space, C.LineSeparator, C.ParagraphSeparator]
56
57-- | List of other categories (C).
58categoryOther       :: [C.GeneralCategory]
59categoryOther        = [C.Control, C.Format, C.Surrogate,
60                        C.PrivateUse, C.NotAssigned]
61
62-- | List of alphabetic categories (L + M).
63categoryAlpha       :: [C.GeneralCategory]
64categoryAlpha        = categoryLetter ++ categoryMark
65
66-- | List of textual-sign categories (P + S).
67categorySign        :: [C.GeneralCategory]
68categorySign         = categoryPunctuation ++ categorySymbol
69
70-- | List of open brackets (Ps + Pi).
71categoryOpen        :: [C.GeneralCategory]
72categoryOpen         = [C.OpenPunctuation, C.InitialQuote]
73
74-- | List of close brackets (Pe + Pf).
75categoryClose       :: [C.GeneralCategory]
76categoryClose        = [C.ClosePunctuation, C.FinalQuote]
77
78
79-- --------------------------------------------  Category lookup
80
81-- | Lookup unicode general categories by its short name.
82--   Short name means two-letter category name
83--   (e.g., @"lu"@ for upper case letter, @"zs"@ for space), or
84--   one-letter category group (e.g., @"l"@ for letter, @"z"@ for separator).
85--
86--   >>> categoryLookup "lu"
87--   Right (fromList [UppercaseLetter])
88--
89--   >>> categoryLookup "n"
90--   Right (fromList [DecimalNumber, LetterNumber, OtherNumber])
91--
92--   >>> categoryLookup "lx"
93--   Left "lx"
94
95categoryLookup :: String -> Either String (Set.Set C.GeneralCategory)
96categoryLookup n =
97    case C.toLower <$> n of
98      "l"     -> l categoryLetter
99      "m"     -> l categoryMark
100      "n"     -> l categoryNumber
101      "p"     -> l categoryPunctuation
102      "s"     -> l categorySymbol
103      "z"     -> l categorySeparator
104      "c"     -> l categoryOther
105
106      "lu"    -> s C.UppercaseLetter
107      "ll"    -> s C.LowercaseLetter
108      "lt"    -> s C.TitlecaseLetter
109      "lm"    -> s C.ModifierLetter
110      "lo"    -> s C.OtherLetter
111
112      "mn"    -> s C.NonSpacingMark
113      "mc"    -> s C.SpacingCombiningMark
114      "me"    -> s C.EnclosingMark
115
116      "nd"    -> s C.DecimalNumber
117      "nl"    -> s C.LetterNumber
118      "no"    -> s C.OtherNumber
119
120      "pc"    -> s C.ConnectorPunctuation
121      "pd"    -> s C.DashPunctuation
122      "ps"    -> s C.OpenPunctuation
123      "pe"    -> s C.ClosePunctuation
124      "pi"    -> s C.InitialQuote
125      "pf"    -> s C.FinalQuote
126      "po"    -> s C.OtherPunctuation
127
128      "sm"    -> s C.MathSymbol
129      "sc"    -> s C.CurrencySymbol
130      "sk"    -> s C.ModifierSymbol
131      "so"    -> s C.OtherSymbol
132
133      "zs"    -> s C.Space
134      "zl"    -> s C.LineSeparator
135      "zp"    -> s C.ParagraphSeparator
136
137      "cc"    -> s C.Control
138      "cf"    -> s C.Format
139      "cs"    -> s C.Surrogate
140      "co"    -> s C.PrivateUse
141      "cn"    -> s C.NotAssigned
142
143      _       -> Left n
144    where
145      l = Right . Set.fromList
146      s = Right . Set.singleton
